body:
Job Responsibilities:
1.Prepare technical service solutions and strategies for radio access network implementation.
2.Provide network design, commissioning, integration, acceptance and migration technical service for RAN products and solutions.
3.Handle the RAN technical problems reported by customers or other support organizations.
4.Deliver validation testing for RAN products, functions and features by collaborating with customer and R&D.
General Requirements:
1.Demand an academic degree minimum on bachelor degree in telecommunications, information technology, information engineering, computer science, applied electronics, automatic control and other relevant area.
2.Require more than 2 years experience in telecommunication, information technology, or other relevant area.
3.Need good communication and presentation skills in English language.
4.Need excellent teamwork abilities and interpersonal skills.
5.Need adaptability for participating projects aboard.
Professional Requirements:
1.Understand any of the mobile telecommunication fundaments and principles: GSM, CDMA, UMTS, WiMAX or LTE.
2.Familiar with radio access network operation and maintenance: BTS, BSC, NodeB, RNC, eNodeB.
3.Know basic transmission technologies of PDH, SDH, ATM, TCP/IP.
4.Have experience on RAN implementation or testing. (Optional)
title: Global Technical Service Engineer-Wireless
